trans-unit.source: Represents a collection container that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示集合容器 (Container)，可讓 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> 控制項維護其子控制項的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> class represents a collection container that enables a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>類別代表集合的容器，可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項來維護它的子控制項的清單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls as child controls.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項只能包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項做為子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the end of an ordinal index array.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A>方法，將新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>序數索引陣列的結尾處。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a new control at a specific index location.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法，將新的控制項加入在特定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at a specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A>索引子以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>位於指定的索引，使用簡單陣列標記法的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>建立控制項時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法用來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A>索引子會使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合，並將其顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> control that owns this collection of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 擁有這個子控制項集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>建立控制項時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法用來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A>索引子會使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合，並將其顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項加入集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method adds the new control to the end of an ordinal index array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A>方法會循序索引陣列的結尾加入新的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項只能是的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To add a control to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將控制項加入至集合中特定的索引位置，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the `MultiView.Views.Add()` syntax is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>建立控制項時，`MultiView.Views.Add()`語法用來新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="v" /> parameter does not specify a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="v" /> 參數不指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The array index at which to add the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項所在處的陣列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項加入集合的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method adds the new control to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法會將新的控制項加入至集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項只能是的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To add a control at the end of an ordinal index array, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將控制項加入序數索引陣列結尾處，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>建立控制項時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法用來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A>索引子會使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合，並將其顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="v" /> parameter does not specify a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="v" /> 參數不指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index value that specifies the location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 循序的索引值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控制項在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control at the specified index location in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 集合中指定索引位置之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> 控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> 控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個索引子以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合中，使用簡單陣列標記法指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>建立控制項時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A>方法用來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A>索引子會使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>集合，並將其顯示給使用者。
